Public Sub Complete ()

abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602.Complete%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602.Completion%2A>工作會進入最終狀態它已經處理所有先前可用的資料。 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602.Complete%2A> 將區塊等待完成發生，而是會起始要求但要等待完成發生，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602.Completion%2A>可能使用的工作。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };
member this.Completion : System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.summary: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流程區塊會時視為完成它目前未處理的訊息，以及當它有保證，不會處理任何其他訊息。 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>完成相關聯的區塊時，會轉換為已完成狀態。 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>區塊完成其處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態時即為資料流程區塊已完成處理提前因未處理的例外狀況，且會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>資料流程區塊完成狀態過早處理，因為收到取消要求。 當工作在<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回<xref:System.AggregateException>包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況。

Docs.param: The that caused the faulting.
Docs.summary: Causes the to complete in a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602.System%23Threading%23Tasks%23Dataflow%23IDataflowBlock%23Fault%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformBlock%602.Completion%2A>工作將會進入最終狀態。 判定為失敗的區塊，做為與取消區塊，會造成遺失緩衝的訊息 （未處理的輸入的訊息，以及 unoffered 的輸出訊息）。

Docs.param: The of the message being consumed.
The consuming the message.
if the message was successfully consumed; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Called by a linked to accept and consume a previously offered by this .
Docs.returns: The value of the consumed message. This may correspond to a different instance than was previously reserved and passed as the to . The consuming must use the returned value instead of the value passed as through . If the message requested is not available, the return value will be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>執行個體連結到這<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>執行個體使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>，並且它必須只能取用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>先前提供此來源到目標執行個體。

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock<TOutput>.ReserveMessage(valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1<!TOutput> target) cil managed

Docs.param: The of the message being reserved.
The reserving the message.
Docs.summary: Called by a linked to reserve a previously offered by this .
Docs.returns: if the message was successfully reserved; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 只有<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>執行個體連結到這<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>執行個體使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>，並且它必須只能保留<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>先前提供此來源到目標執行個體。
如果`true`傳回，則<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>必須接著呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A>這個訊息。 若要這樣做可能會導致無法傳播到這個或其他目標的任何其他訊息的來源。
<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> 必須不會呼叫目標所保留的任何內部鎖定時。 這樣會違反鎖定階層以避免資料流程網路中的死結。

MemberSignature.Value: System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus ITargetBlock<TInput>.OfferMessage (System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, TInput messageValue, System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock<TInput> source, bool consumeToAccept);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock<TInput>.OfferMessage(valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, !TInput messageValue, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1<!TInput> source, bool consumeToAccept) cil managed

Function OfferMessage (messageHeader As DataflowMessageHeader, messageValue As TInput, source As ISourceBlock(Of TInput), consumeToAccept As Boolean) As DataflowMessageStatus Implements ITargetBlock(Of TInput).OfferMessage

virtual System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageStatus System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock<TInput>.OfferMessage(System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, TInput messageValue, System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ISourceBlock<TInput> ^ source, bool consumeToAccept) = System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<TInput>::OfferMessage;

Docs.param: A instance that represents the header of the message being offered.
The value of the message being offered.
The offering the message. This may be .
if the target must call synchronously during the call to , prior to returning , in order to consume the message.
Docs.summary: Offers a message to the , giving the target the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
Docs.returns: The status of the offered message. If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target. If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks. If the target would have otherwise postponed but source was , is instead returned. If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned. If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned. If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
Docs.exception: The is not valid. -or- may only be true if provided with a non-null .
